CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Application management for Microsoft Edge
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Brings app layer management to Windows.  Supports app configuration and app protection for Microsoft Edge.  Includes app protection Conditional Access and Windows Defender integration.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Intune: Application management for Microsoft Edge
OldVersion.description: ,Brings app layer management to Windows.  Supports app configuration and app protection for Microsoft Edge.  Includes app protection Conditional Access and Windows Defender integration.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Topics engagement analytics in Topic center
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Usage and engagement analytics showing Topics adoption and value will be available to knowledge
managers in a new analytics tab in Topic center. Analytics will include Unique users and Usage counts for Topics usage activities all up; Unique users and Usage counts for Topics for consuming, contributing and sharing Topics activities; Usage count details for Topics consumption activities from Topic card, page, search, Topic center cards; Usage count details for Topics for contribution activities like Editing and publishing topics, providing feedback.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Topics engagement analytics in Topic center
OldVersion.description: ,Usage and engagement analytics showing Topics adoption and value will be available to knowledge managers in a new analytics tab in Topic center. Analytics will include Unique users and Usage counts for Topics usage activities all up; Unique users and Usage counts for Topics for consuming, contributing and sharing Topics activities; Usage count details for Topics consumption activities from Topic card, page, search, Topic center cards; Usage count details for Topics for contribution activities like Editing and publishing topics, providing feedback.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Meeting participants time-zone
CurrentVersion.description: When scheduling a meeting with people from different time-zones, the user will be prompted with suggested start times and additional insights that correspond to the participants respective time-zone, ensuring a more suitable time for all meeting participants.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: meeting participants time-zone
OldVersion.description:
When scheduling a meeting with people from
different time-zones, the user will be prompted with suggested start times and
additional insights that correspond to the participants respective time-zone,
ensuring a more suitable time for all meeting participants.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Exact Data Match to support multi-token corroborative evidence
CurrentVersion.description: Exact Data Match (EDM) will support string match detection of multi-token (i.e., fields with multiple words separated by spaces or punctuation) corroborative evidence without requiring mapping Sensitive Information Types (SITs) to multi-token corroborative evidence fields.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Information Protection - Exact Data Match to support multi-token corroborative evidence
OldVersion.description: Exact Data Match (EDM) will support string match detection of multi-token (i.e., fields with multiple words separated by spaces or punctuation) corroborative evidence without requiring mapping Sensitive Information Types (SITs) to multi-token corroborative evidence fields.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Support for static and adaptive policy scopes for auto-apply retention labels targeting SITs in Exchange
CurrentVersion.description: Auto-apply retention labels targeting sensitive information types in Exchange will now support static include/exclude and adaptive policy scopes. Previously admins could only target all Exchange mailboxes.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Lifecycle Management - Support for static and adaptive policy scopes for auto-apply retention labels targeting SITs in Exchange
OldVersion.description: Auto-apply retention labels targeting sensitive information types in Exchange will now support static include/exclude and adaptive policy scopes. Previously admins could only target all Exchange mailboxes.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview: Data Loss Prevention - messages delivered to hosted Quarantine for Exchange Online is moving to quarantine page in Microsoft 365 Defender portal
CurrentVersion.description: The messages delivered to hosted quarantine matching a DLP policy is moving from Exchange transport rule to the Quarantine page in the Microsoft 365 Defender portal.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview: Data Loss Prevention - messages delivered to hosted Quarantine for Exchange Online is moving to quarantine page in Microsoft 365 Defender portal
OldVersion.description:
The
messages delivered to hosted quarantine matching a DLP policy is moving from Exchange
transport rule to the Quarantine page in the Microsoft 365 Defender
portal.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Pre-pin meeting apps via Admin Policy in the Teams admin center
CurrentVersion.description: Admins can now pre-pin meetings apps for users (much like personal apps and messaging extensions) in the Teams admin center

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Pre-pin meeting apps via Admin Policy in the Teams admin center
OldVersion.description:
Admins can now pre-pin meetings apps for users (much
like personal apps and messaging extensions) in the Teams admin center

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery (Premium) - App Permissions for Graph API
CurrentVersion.description: ,Now organizations who are automating eDiscovery workflows will be able to authenticate and execute workflows with an application based authentication method.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery (Premium) - App Permissions for Graph API
OldVersion.description: ,Now organizations who are automating eDiscovery workflows will be able to authenticate and execute workflows with an application based authentication method.

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Auto-follow when follow session initiated
CurrentVersion.description: Participants of a whiteboard will automatically start following a user that starts a follow session when it is initiated.

OldVersion.title: Whiteboard: Auto-follow when follow session initiated
OldVersion.description:
Participants of a whiteboard will automatically
start following a user that starts a follow session when it is initiated.

CurrentVersion.title: Whiteboard: Open existing board in Teams with Follow
CurrentVersion.description: The ability to open an existing whiteboard in a Teams meeting with the follow feature already initiated. This allows users to share a whiteboard with follow enabled immediately.

OldVersion.title: Whiteboard: Open existing board in Teams with Follow
OldVersion.description: The ability to open an existing whiteboard in a Teams meeting with the follow feature already initiated. This allows users to share a whiteboard with follow enabled immediately.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Microsoft 365 Groups connected Viva Goals Teams
CurrentVersion.description: Users will now save time with a simplified set-up experience for setting up their Viva Goals Teams.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Microsoft 365 Groups connected Viva Goals Teams
OldVersion.description: Users will now save time with a simplified set-up experience for setting up their Viva Goals Teams.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - App Permissions for Graph API
CurrentVersion.description: Now organizations who are automating eDiscovery workflows will be able to authenticate and execute workflows with an application based authentication method.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: eDiscovery - App Permissions for Graph API
OldVersion.description: Now organizations who are automating eDiscovery workflows will be able to authenticate and execute workflows with an application based authentication method.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams Rooms on Windows All-in-one experience
CurrentVersion.description: With this update, Teams Rooms on Windows will support all-in-one and board device form factors, such as the Surface Hub 3.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams Rooms on Windows All-in-one experience
OldVersion.description:
With this update,
Teams Rooms on Windows will support all-in-one and board device form factors,
such as the Surface Hub 3.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Create up to 50 Viva Connections experiences within a tenant
CurrentVersion.description: Customers with Viva suite or Viva Communications and Communities license can create up to 50 distinct Connections experiences for their audience groups. This is currently limited to only 10 experiences.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Create up to 50 Viva Connections experiences within a tenant
OldVersion.description: Customers with Viva suite or Viva Communications and Communities license can create up to 50 distinct Connections experiences for their audience groups. This is currently limited to only 10 experiences.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage Community Creation API
CurrentVersion.description:
,
The community creation API supports programmatic creation of Microsoft Viva Engage communities via the MS Graph platform.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Engage Community Creation API
OldVersion.description: ,The community creation API supports programmatic creation of Microsoft Viva Engage communities via the MS Graph platform.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Together mode and content share layout improvement
CurrentVersion.description: With the new layout, Together mode will be displayed under the shared content. The users will be able to see the participants in Together mode and shared content simultaneously in a completely new way. Full Together mode experience is available including raised hands, reactions and name labels.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Together mode and content share layout improvement
OldVersion.description:
With
the new layout, Together mode will be displayed under the shared content. The
users will be able to see the participants in Together mode and shared content
simultaneously in a completely new way. Full Together mode experience is
available including raised hands, reactions and name labels.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management- Global exclusions
CurrentVersion.description:
,With this update, all exclusion features currently found under intelligent detections will be relocated to a new tab labeled "Global exclusions" within the insider risk settings. All previously added exclusions in intelligent detections will be migrated to this new tab.
The functionality of exclusions remains unchanged. Moreover, admins with appropriate permissions can now add exclusion via defined detection groups, which contain similar entities like domains or file types. This new tab is designed to enhance usability and offers a convenient way to access and manage exclusions.
Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Insider Risk Management- Global exclusions
OldVersion.description:
,With this update, all exclusion features currently found under intelligent detections will be relocated to a new tab labeled "Global exclusions" within the insider risk settings. All previously added exclusions in intelligent detections will be migrated to this new tab.
The functionality of exclusions remains unchanged. Moreover, admins with appropriate permissions can now add exclusion via defined detection groups, which contain similar entities like domains or file types. This new tab is designed to enhance usability and offers a convenient way to access and manage exclusions.
Microsoft Purview Insider Risk Management correlates various signals to identify potential malicious or inadvertent insider risks, such as IP theft, data leakage, and security violations. Insider Risk Management enables customers to create policies based on their own internal policies, governance, and organizational requirements. Built with privacy by design, users are pseudonymized by default, and role-based access controls and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Meeting Recap for transcript-only meetings (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Intelligent recap will support meetings with only transcript enabled, and without recording enabled. In the case when only transcript is enabled for a meeting, the features from intelligent recap that users can access are AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Meeting Recap for transcript-only meetings (Premium)
OldVersion.description:
Intelligent recap will support meetings with
only transcript enabled, and without recording enabled. In the case when only
transcript is enabled for a meeting, the features from intelligent recap that
users can access are AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name
mentions.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365: Microsoft 365 Backup
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Microsoft 365 Backup Service is a product offering spanning across the OneDrive, SharePoint, and Exchange Online services that provides customers with a consistent, cross product solution, to recover their M365 data from cataclysmic events such as: at scale ransomware attacks, or malicious/accidental data deletion/corruption by end users. Microsoft 365 Backup Service is available on a pay-as-you-go basis and can be enabled through the Microsoft 365 admin center.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft 365: Microsoft 365 Backup
OldVersion.description: ,Microsoft 365 Backup Service is a product offering spanning across the OneDrive, SharePoint, and Exchange Online services that provides customers with a consistent, cross product solution, to recover their M365 data from cataclysmic events such as: at scale ransomware attacks, or malicious/accidental data deletion/corruption by end users. Microsoft 365 Backup Service is available on a pay-as-you-go basis and can be enabled through the Microsoft 365 admin center.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Object Character Recognition (OCR) support for embedded images in Exchange Online and Microsoft Teams
CurrentVersion.description: We are extending the Object Character Recognition (OCR) for Exchange Online and Microsoft Teams in Microsoft Purview to support images embedded in more file types such as: Hybrid PDF files, which are PDF files with both images and searchable text,  Microsoft Office files with the extensions DOCX, PPTX, XLSX , Container files such as zip, rar, 7z, and more.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal: Data Loss Prevention-Improving DLP Policy tip text for matched recipients in Outlook win32
CurrentVersion.description: ,We are updating the DLP Policy tip text in Outlook windows desktop client that appears when end users attempt to send a sensitive email to recipients who are not authorized by your organization's DLP policies. Users will soon receive a more gentle policy tip nudge to review recipients and content before sending email.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Meeting Recap on Teams Mobile (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Intelligent recap is now available on Teams for iOS and Android, so users can access AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions, and easily browse the meeting recording by speakers.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Intelligent Meeting Recap on Teams Mobile (Premium)
OldVersion.description: Intelligent recap is now available on Teams for iOS and Android, so users can access AI-generated meeting notes, AI-generated tasks, and name mentions, and easily browse the meeting recording by speakers.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Viva Connections - Manage your organization’s brand in the new brand center
CurrentVersion.description: We’re introducing new branding and management capabilities that you can use to improve consistency across your Viva Connections desktop, mobile, and tablet experiences.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Introducing custom fonts for SharePoint and Viva Connections Desktop
CurrentVersion.description: Fonts are more than just letters and symbols, and we've heard you. We're bringing font customization to your SharePoint and Viva Connections experiences with the brand center. Express your personality, style, and brand by adding custom fonts to your sites and related experiences.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Create themes for SharePoint and Viva Connections in brand center
CurrentVersion.description: We're bringing a new theme creation experience into the brand center, allowing you to easily create and manage themes for your sites and related experiences.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Customize your Viva Connections experiences with fonts and themes
CurrentVersion.description: Site owners and operators will now be able to create branded fonts and themes for their sites and experiences in the brand center by combining the branding assets that the organization provides or by creating their own.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft 365 admin center: Integration of Auto-Claim Policy for Licensing of Microsoft Loop and Microsoft Clipchamp in your Tenant
CurrentVersion.description: We're excited to announce an upcoming feature to enhance our Microsoft 365 offerings with a new, innovative auto-claim policy for Microsoft Loop and Microsoft Clipchamp. These two applications can be configured as a policy, allowing users with active base offerings like Microsoft 365 E3/E5 Original SKUs to automatically claim a Microsoft 365 Extra Features E3/E5 license when needed. As they engage with Microsoft Loop and Microsoft Clipchamp, a license from your tenant's pre-provisioned Microsoft 365 Extra Features E3/E5 SKU will be seamlessly assigned to them. This new feature is designed to simplify admin tasks and requirements.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Stream: Pay-as-you-go transcript translations
CurrentVersion.description:
Make your content more inclusive by creating videos that your coworkers can easily view and understand in their primary language. Transcript translations in Stream (on SharePoint) give you the option to translate the transcript and closed captions of your Stream videos into more than 100 supported languages. To enable translations Admins must first setup billing using an Azure subscription, then they must be enable the feature in the M365 Admin center. Once enabled translations are billed via pay-as-you-go meters.
More info: https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/office/microsoft-syntex-pay-as-you-go-transcript-translations-in-stream-for-sharepoint-2e34ad1b-e213-47ed-a806-5cc0d88751de

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Introducing custom fonts for SharePoint
CurrentVersion.description: Fonts are more than just letters and symbols, and we've heard you. We're bringing font customization to your SharePoint and Viva Connections experiences with the brand center. Express your personality, style, and brand by adding custom fonts to your sites and related experiences.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Create themes for SharePoint in brand center
CurrentVersion.description: We're bringing a new theme creation experience into the brand center, allowing you to easily create and manage themes for your sites and related experiences.

CurrentVersion.title: SharePoint: Customize your individual sites and experiences with fonts and themes
CurrentVersion.description: Site owners will now be able to create branded fonts and themes for their sites and experiences in the brand center by combining the branding assets that the organization provides or by creating their own.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: To Do app opens in the new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Use the To Do app without leaving the new Outlook for Windows! Click the To Do icon in the navigation bar to open inline without opening in a separate browser window.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Organizers can select languages for translation in a town hall (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Town hall organizers will be able to select the caption languages that will be available to the attendees for translation. Currently the languages are preset for attendees to pick from; now organizers will be able to select the 10 translated languages available to attendees.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Join meetings and make calls on Android Auto
CurrentVersion.description: Teams on Android Auto lets you easily join meetings from the calendar view, quickly call your speed dial contacts and see your recent calls on your Android phones.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Forms: New user onboarding experience
CurrentVersion.description: Introducing an upgraded onboarding experience tailored for new Forms users, designed to provide a seamless and user-friendly initiation to the platform. Get started effortlessly with our refreshed interface and streamlined features.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Topic engagement analytics
CurrentVersion.description:
,
This update will introduce usage and engagement analytics on topics (views, edits, etc.) to the Microsoft Admin Center.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Topic engagement analytics
OldVersion.description: ,This update will introduce usage and engagement analytics on topics (views, edits, etc.) to the Microsoft Admin Center.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview | Communication Compliance Empower end users to report inappropriate messages in Teams
CurrentVersion.description:
Microsoft Teams users are empowered to report inappropriate or concerning messages within Teams chat and channels. These reported messages are then submitted to a Communication Compliance policy for investigators to review and take action if deemed necessary. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/compliance/communication-compliance?view=o365-worldwide

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview | Communication Compliance Empower end users to report inappropriate messages in Teams
OldVersion.description:
Microsoft Teams users are empowered to report inappropriate or concerning messages within Teams chat and channels. These reported messages are then submitted to a Communication Compliance policy for investigators to review and take action if deemed necessary. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/compliance/communication-compliance?view=o365-worldwide

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal:  eDiscovery (Premium) – Hold reports
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Out-of-the-box reports that contain information about all legal holds associated with eDiscovery cases in the Microsoft Purview compliance portal. Sort and filter your view based on various criteria and download the aggregated information for further analysis.

OldVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal:  eDiscovery (Premium) – Hold reports
OldVersion.description: ,Out-of-the-box reports that contain information about all legal holds associated with eDiscovery cases in the Microsoft Purview compliance portal. Sort and filter your view based on various criteria and download the aggregated information for further analysis.

CurrentVersion.title: Outlook: To Do app opens in the new Outlook for Windows
CurrentVersion.description: Use the To Do app without leaving the new Outlook for Windows! Click the To Do icon in the navigation bar to open inline without opening in a separate browser window.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Organizers can select languages for translation in a town hall (Premium)
CurrentVersion.description: Town hall organizers will be able to select the caption languages that will be available to the attendees for translation. Currently the languages are preset for attendees to pick from; now organizers will be able to select the 10 translated languages available to attendees.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Teams: Join meetings and make calls on Android Auto
CurrentVersion.description: Teams on Android Auto lets you easily join meetings from the calendar view, quickly call your speed dial contacts and see your recent calls on your Android phones.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Forms: New user onboarding experience
CurrentVersion.description: Introducing an upgraded onboarding experience tailored for new Forms users, designed to provide a seamless and user-friendly initiation to the platform. Get started effortlessly with our refreshed interface and streamlined features.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Viva: Topic engagement analytics
CurrentVersion.description:
,
This update will introduce usage and engagement analytics on topics (views, edits, etc.) to the Microsoft Admin Center.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview | Communication Compliance Empower end users to report inappropriate messages in Teams
CurrentVersion.description:
Microsoft Teams users are empowered to report inappropriate or concerning messages within Teams chat and channels. These reported messages are then submitted to a Communication Compliance policy for investigators to review and take action if deemed necessary. Microsoft Purview Communication Compliance provides the tools to help organizations detect regulatory compliance violations (e.g. SEC or FINRA), such as sensitive or confidential information, harassing or threatening language, and sharing of adult content. Built with privacy by design, usernames are pseudonymized by default, role-based access controls are built in, investigators are opted in by an admin, and audit logs are in place to help ensure user-level privacy.
More info: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/microsoft-365/compliance/communication-compliance?view=o365-worldwide

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal:  eDiscovery (Premium) – Hold reports
CurrentVersion.description:
,
Out-of-the-box reports that contain information about all legal holds associated with eDiscovery cases in the Microsoft Purview compliance portal. Sort and filter your view based on various criteria and download the aggregated information for further analysis.

CurrentVersion.title: Microsoft Purview compliance portal:  eDiscovery (Premium) – Hold reports (U.S. Government clouds)
CurrentVersion.description: Out-of-the-box reports that contain information about all legal holds associated with eDiscovery cases in the Microsoft Purview compliance portal. Sort and filter your view based on various criteria and download the aggregated information for further analysis.
